bill_title: increase household income thresholds for a paraplegic tax reduction.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to increase household income thresholds for a paraplegic tax reduction. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 10-4-24.12 be AMENDED: 10-4-24.12. The percentage tax reduction of real property taxes, as provided pursuant to § 10-4-24.11, due or paid on a single family dwelling for a single member household is according to the following schedule: If household income but not The tax due reduction is more than: more than on current levy is: $ 0 $11,67014,000 100% 11,67014,000 12,67015,000 75% 12,67015,000 13,67017,000 50% 13,67017,000 14,67018,000 25% more than 14,67018,000 0% If household income but not The tax due reduction is more than: more than on current levy is: $ 0 $11,67014,000 100% 11,67014,000 12,67015,000 75% 12,67015,000 13,67017,000 50% 13,67017,000 14,67018,000 25% more than 14,67018,000 0%
